article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City.
article.content:
​

1000 Walnut, Suite 500
Kansas City, MO 64106
Phone: 816-421-1876
Fax: 816-256-5502
Email:Office.KansasCity@trade.gov

** If your industry sector is not listed, please call the office.**


Regina Heise, USEAC Director

Tel:816-421-1932

Email:Regina.Heise@trade.gov

Industries:Agricultural Chemicals, Agricultural Machinery & Eq., Agricultural Products, Agricultural Services, Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Airport/Ground Support Equipment, Architectural/Construction/Engineering Service, Artwork, Aviation Services, Environmental Technologies & Services, Food Processing/Packaging Equipment, Franchising, Pollution Control Equipment, Water Resources Equipment.

Sally Pacheco, International Trade Specialist

Tel:816-421-0541

Email:Sally.Pacheco@trade.gov

Industries:Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Equipment, Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Equipment., Building Products, Computer Software, Computers/Peripherals, Construction Equipment, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Electronic Components, Electronics Industry Products/Test Equipment, Foods - Processed, Health Care Services, Heavy Equipment, Material Handling Equipment, Medical Equipment, Mining Industry Equipment, Packaging Equipment, Pet Foods/Supplements, Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Railroad Equipment, Safety & Security, Telecommunications Equipment, Transportation Services (other than Aviation), Trucks/Trailers/Buses, Veterinary Medicine Equipment/Supplies

Marisa Ring, International Trade Specialist

Tel:816-421-4809

Email:Marisa.Ring@trade.gov

Industries:Books/Periodicals, Consumer Electronics, Chemical Production Machinery, Education/Training Services, Footwear, General Consumer Goods, Giftware, Household Consumer Goods, Jewelry, Lawn/Garden Equip., Oil/Gas Equip. & Services, Paper, Printing/Graphic Arts Equip., Renewable Energy, Sporting Goods/Recreational Equip., Tools-Hand Power, Toys/Games, Textiles – Products & Equip., and Yarns.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.
article.seometadatatitle: U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City Contact Information
article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City.
article.seometadatakeyword: export, exporting, assistance, Kansas City, Missouri, contact
